stories.text:
I'm currently looking for a good UEM like ManageEngine , Jump Cloud . I found Jump Cloud better but it doesn't offer support to linux machines ... Is there any service that offers cross platform support?

I mainly need to be able to Peform Patch Management , Restrict Softwares , Controlling User Account and enforcing disk encryption .

Thanks

stories.text:
Online shopping hacks that you must need to know

When it comes to shopping online, there are some things you need to know. Like, how to get the best deals and how shipping works. Online shopping has become huge in recent years. It can be hard to find a reliable site that sells high-quality items for great prices, but it's worth the search! Following are the some tips to help you get started on your new online shopping journey. 1. Place orders from trusted website you should always go for trusted and familiar websites. The website should be secure as you are sharing your personal information with them.

2. Reviews & Rating Reviews are really important because they provide insight into the quality of product which we are purchasing.

3. Shipping charges & Delivery time try to find a retailer with free shipping and no hidden fees for shipping and handling

4. Seasonal sale When you shop at a seasonal sale, you can find great deals on items you need now or in the future.

5. Coupons and Deals Online shopping is incomplete without discount coupons. CouponMoto is one such website were, you can find Coupons or deals for every store or category. Enjoy online shopping !
stories.title: Online shopping hacks that you must need to know
